授業目的: Students will acquire English communication skills at the intermediate level by working on conversation, listening, composition and grammar.
到達目標:
The goals of this course is to develop students' overall English skills.
Watching the movie they will learn various expressions which are very practical and useful
in using English. Students are expected to activate their grammar knowledge in order to
express themselves. Students' goal is to be able to say what they want to say when they want to say.
授業方法:
This course includes both lectures and student-centered activities such as pair work, group work, presentation, etc.
Lessons are conducted face to face in the classroom.

トピック.授業計画1:
Each lesson starts with warm-up activities such as greeting, listening to popular music, and reading a short newspaper article. Then each unit of the textbook will be covered. One classroom hour is spent on one unit.
The first week lesson of this course includes introduction, course description and course requirements. Detailed procedure of this course will be explained in class. Students will be given the schedule and information as to what they are supposed to do in class. Therefore to attend the first week lesson is strongly desirable.
Students are required to attend every class and actively get involved in various language activities and to use English in class. They are also encouraged to ask questions and negotiate for clarification and meaning.
トピック.授業外学習2: English materials such as graded readers, TOEIC exercise books, English newspapers, and NHK radio programs should be used to study English at home or outside the classroom.
